title: Drachenscolderung (Drachenscolder√ºng): A Dragon's Story
description: A mysterious dragon crash lands in an African village, and a young girl nurses it back to health only to find out he is half human and can switch between the two forms. This dragon is experienced in the art of Technology and requests help from the village to free his Mother. (It also comes with extras that serve as a peek into the world of TSODR.)
author: L'Poni Baldwin
